mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts(id, title, category, content, writer, password, ctime) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{category}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{password}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, category, content, writer, password, IF(date(ctime) = date(NOW()), DATE_FORMAT(ctime, "%H:%i"), DATE_FORMAT(ctime, "%Y.%m.%d")) AS ctime FROM posts WHERE category = 'notice' ORDER BY id DESC

choose.when: AND (writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))
